message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with deep learning approaches and their limitations in incremental learning, which is a common problem in machine learning. The paper proposes an end-to-end approach to address this issue, which involves learning the data representation and the classifier jointly. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and computational linguistics (cs.CL).
